replies.body:
Hey there,

In the future you should post threads about technical issues in the Help & Support section of the boards.

Anyway, could you try running through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if this helps at all.
